scripts.fast: npm run build && npm run exec
scripts.dev: nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "npm run build && node ./dist/index.js"
scripts.setup: npm install typescript --save-dev && npx tsc --init && mkdir src && echo // Your TypeScript code goes here > src/index.ts
scripts.node-setup: npm install typescript --save-dev @types/node nodemon express @types/express && npx tsc --init && mkdir src && echo // Your TypeScript + Express code goes here > src/index.ts
